TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit JapaneseCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表日本曆法。

span.span: Represents the Japanese calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日本曆法，就是所謂的 」 曆法的曆法，運作方式完全一樣西曆，除了年份和紀元不同。The Japanese calendar, which is also known as the Wareki calendar, works exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different. > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 日本曆法會辨識為每個國王 reign 一個紀元。The Japanese calendar recognizes one era for every emperor's reign. 目前紀元是平成紀元，開始於西曆的 1989 年。The current era is the Heisei era, which began in the Gregorian calendar year 1989. 紀元名稱通常會顯示在年份的前。The era name is typically displayed before the year. 例如，西曆日曆 2001 年度是日文的日曆年度平成 13。For example, the Gregorian calendar year 2001 is the Japanese calendar year Heisei 13. 請注意，第一年的紀元稱為 「 元年。 」Note that the first year of an era is called "Gannen." 因此，西曆 1989 年日本日曆年度平成元年。Therefore, the Gregorian calendar year 1989 was the Japanese calendar year Heisei Gannen. 這個類別會指派數字給紀元，如下所示：This class assigns numbers to the eras as follows: |GetEra 值GetEra value|紀元名稱Era Name|紀元縮寫Era Abbreviation|西曆日期Gregorian Dates| |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| |44|平成 （平成）平成 (Heisei)|平 (H、 h)平 (H, h)|1989 年 1 月 8 日呈現January 8, 1989 to present| |33|昭和 (Showa)昭和 (Showa)|昭 （S，s）昭 (S, s)|1926 年 12 月 25 日 1989 年 1 月 7日，December 25, 1926 to January 7, 1989| |22|大正 (Taisho)大正 (Taisho)|大 （T、 t）大 (T, t)|1912 年 7 月 30 日 1926 年 12 月 24日，July 30, 1912 to December 24, 1926| |11|明治 （明治）明治 (Meiji)|明 （M，m）明 (M, m)|1868 年 9 月 8 日 1912 年 7 月 29日，September 8, 1868 to July 29, 1912| 這個類別會處理從 9 月 8 中 （在西曆日曆年 9 月 8，1868年） 明治 1 年的日期。This class handles dates from September 8 in the year Meiji 1 (in the Gregorian calendar, September 8, 1868). 雖然日本曆法已從切換陰曆陽曆明治 6 (西曆的 1873) 中，這個實作根據陽曆的行事曆。Although the Japanese calendar was switched from a lunar calendar to a solar calendar in the year Meiji 6 (1873 of the Gregorian calendar), this implementation is based on the solar calendar only. 閏年日本曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 日本曆法具有 12 個月有 28 到 31 天每個：The Japanese calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: |GetMonth 值GetMonth value|月份Month|英文English|常見的年數天Days in common years|閏年的天數Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|-------------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|1 月 (Ichigatsu)1月 (Ichigatsu)|年 1 月January|3131|3131| |22|2 月 (Nigatsu)2月 (Nigatsu)|2 月版February|2828|2929| |33|3 月 (Sangatsu)3月 (Sangatsu)|年 3 月March|3131|3131| |44|4 月 (Shigatsu)4月 (Shigatsu)|年 4 月April|3030|3030| |55|5月 (Gogatsu)5月 (Gogatsu)|可能May|3131|3131| |66|6月 (Rokugatsu)6月 (Rokugatsu)|JuneJune|3030|3030| |77|7月 (Shichigatsu)7月 (Shichigatsu)|年 7 月July|3131|3131| |88|8 月 (Hachigatsu)8月 (Hachigatsu)|年 8 月August|3131|3131| |99|9月 (Kugatsu)9月 (Kugatsu)|年 9 月September|3030|3030| |1010|10 月 (Juugatsu)10月 (Juugatsu)|年 10 月October|3131|3131| |1111|11 月 (Juuichigatsu)11月 (Juuichigatsu)|11 月November|3030|3030| |1212|12 月 (Juunigatsu)12月 (Juunigatsu)|年 12 月December|3131|3131| Nigatsu，相當於 2 月的西曆月份，都有 29 天，閏年和 28。Nigatsu, which is equivalent to the Gregorian calendar month of February, has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期年 1 月 1，2001 A.D.。The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在西曆中就相當於 Ichigatsu 日本曆法的平成 13 年中的第一天。in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of Ichigatsu in the year Heisei 13 in the Japanese calendar. 如果應用程式使用類別辨識前面年份的紀元縮寫。If the application is using the class, recognizes the era abbreviations in front of the year. 單一字元不區分大小寫英文字母縮寫或單一字元漢字縮寫縮寫。The abbreviation is either the single-character case-insensitive Latin alphabet abbreviation or the single-character Kanji abbreviation. 每個物件支援一組的行事曆。Each object supports a set of calendars. 屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，應用程式應該設定屬性至新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime AddMonths (DateTime time, int months);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.DateTime AddMonths(valuetype System.DateTime time, int32 months) cil managed
Public Overrides Function AddMonths (time As DateTime, months As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定月數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的月數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 產生的紀元部分如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會影響。The era part of the resulting is affected if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 Juugatsu （10 月） 的 31 天內，指定的日期是該月第 31 天和`months`為 6，產生的年份為一個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是 Shigatsu （年 4 月） 和產生的日期為第 30 天，Shigatsu （年 4 月） 中的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is Juugatsu (October), which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and `months` is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Shigatsu (April), and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in Shigatsu (April). 如果`months`是負數，產生早於指定。If `months` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面日本曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Japanese calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CPP/japanesecalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CS/japanesecalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/VB/japanesecalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is less than -120000.

The number of years to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定年數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of years away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的年數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of years to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 產生的紀元部分如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會影響。The era part of the resulting is affected if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，Nigatsu （二月） 具有以外的 28 天，閏年時有 29 天期間。For example, Nigatsu (February) has 28 days except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是閏年和的值中 Nigatsu （二月） 第 29 天`years`為 1，則產生的日期會在下一年度 Nigatsu （二月） 的 28 天。If the specified date is the 29th day of Nigatsu (February) in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of Nigatsu (February) in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面日本曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Japanese calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CPP/japanesecalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CS/japanesecalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/VB/japanesecalendar_addget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 中的紀元清單。

span.span: Gets the list of eras in the .

value.span: 整數陣列，表示 中的紀元。

span.span: An array of integers that represents the eras in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日本曆法會辨識為每個國王 reign 一個紀元。The Japanese calendar recognizes one era for every emperor's reign. 目前紀元是平成紀元，開始於西曆的 1989 年。The current era is the Heisei era, which began in the Gregorian calendar year 1989. 紀元名稱通常會顯示在年份的前。The era name is typically displayed before the year. 例如，西曆日曆 2001 年度是日文的日曆年度平成 13。For example, the Gregorian calendar year 2001 is the Japanese calendar year Heisei 13. 請注意，第一年的紀元稱為 「 元年。 」Note that the first year of an era is called "Gannen." 因此，西曆 1989 年日本日曆年度平成元年。Therefore, the Gregorian calendar year 1989 was the Japanese calendar year Heisei Gannen. 這個類別會指派數字給紀元，如下所示：This class assigns numbers to the eras as follows: |GetEra 值GetEra value|紀元名稱Era Name|紀元縮寫Era Abbreviation|西曆日期Gregorian Dates| |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| |44|平成 （平成）平成 (Heisei)|平 (H、 h)平 (H, h)|1989 年 1 月 8 日呈現January 8, 1989 to present| |33|昭和 (Showa)昭和 (Showa)|昭 （S，s）昭 (S, s)|1926 年 12 月 25 日 1989 年 1 月 7日，December 25, 1926 to January 7, 1989| |22|大正 (Taisho)大正 (Taisho)|大 （T、 t）大 (T, t)|1912 年 7 月 30 日 1926 年 12 月 24日，July 30, 1912 to December 24, 1926| |11|明治 （明治）明治 (Meiji)|明 （M，m）明 (M, m)|1868 年 9 月 8 日 1912 年 7 月 29日，September 8, 1868 to July 29, 1912| 這個類別會處理從 9 月 8 年份明治 1 (年 1 月 1，1868 西曆的) 中的日期。This class handles dates from September 8 in the year Meiji 1 (January 1, 1868 of the Gregorian calendar). 雖然日本曆法已從切換陰曆陽曆明治 6 (西曆的 1873) 中，這個實作根據陽曆的行事曆。Although the Japanese calendar was switched from a lunar calendar to a solar calendar in the year Meiji 6 (1873 of the Gregorian calendar), this implementation is based on the solar calendar only. > [!NOTE] > 在未來新增其他紀元，應用程式可能會遇到超過預期的四個紀元的日本曆法。Should additional eras be added in the future, applications may encounter more than the expected four eras for the Japanese calendar. 應該測試應用程式，以確保它們仍然繼續使用這類事件。請參閱[日本曆法的紀元處理](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=239618)。Applications should be tested to ensure that they continue to work in such an event; see [Era Handling for the Japanese Calendar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=239618). ## Examples 下列範例顯示中包含的值屬性。The following example displays the values contained in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras/CPP/yslin_japanesecalendar_eras.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras/CS/yslin_japanesecalendar_eras.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras/VB/yslin_japanesecalendar_eras.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值如下：The values are as follows: |DayOfWeek 值DayOfWeek value|表示which indicates| |---------------------|---------------------| |星期日Sunday|日曜日 (Nichiyoubi)日曜日 (Nichiyoubi)| |週一Monday|月曜日 (Getsuyoubi)月曜日 (Getsuyoubi)| |星期二Tuesday|火曜日 (Kayoubi)火曜日 (Kayoubi)| |週三Wednesday|水曜日 (Suiyoubi)水曜日 (Suiyoubi)| |星期四Thursday|木曜日 (Mokuyoubi)木曜日 (Mokuyoubi)| |週五Friday|金曜日 (Kinyoubi)金曜日 (Kinyoubi)| |星期六Saturday|土曜日 (Doyoubi)土曜日 (Doyoubi)| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面日本曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Japanese calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CPP/japanesecalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CS/japanesecalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/VB/japanesecalendar_addget.vb#1)]

span.span: The to read.

summary.span: 傳回指定之 中一年中的日期。

span.span: Returns the day of the year in the specified .

returns.span: 從 1 到 366 的整數，表示指定之 中的年份日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和月最後一天一次在該年份，是相同的值傳回總天數傳回的。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面日本曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Japanese calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CPP/japanesecalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CS/japanesecalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/VB/japanesecalendar_addget.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetEra (DateTime time);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetEra(valuetype System.DateTime time) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEra (time As DateTime) As Integer
public: override int GetEra(DateTime time);

span.span: The to read.

summary.span: 傳回指定 中的紀元。

span.span: Returns the era in the specified .

returns.span: 整數，表示指定 中的紀元。

span.span: An integer that represents the era in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日本曆法會辨識為每個國王 reign 一個紀元。The Japanese calendar recognizes one era for every emperor's reign. 目前紀元是平成紀元，開始於西曆的 1989 年。The current era is the Heisei era, which began in the Gregorian calendar year 1989. 紀元名稱通常會顯示在年份的前。The era name is typically displayed before the year. 例如，西曆日曆 2001 年度是日文的日曆年度平成 13。For example, the Gregorian calendar year 2001 is the Japanese calendar year Heisei 13. 請注意，第一年的紀元稱為 「 元年。 」Note that the first year of an era is called "Gannen." 因此，西曆 1989 年日本日曆年度平成元年。Therefore, the Gregorian calendar year 1989 was the Japanese calendar year Heisei Gannen. 這個類別會指派數字給紀元，如下所示：This class assigns numbers to the eras as follows: |GetEra 值GetEra value|紀元名稱Era Name|紀元縮寫Era Abbreviation|西曆日期Gregorian Dates| |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| |44|平成 （平成）平成 (Heisei)|平 (H、 h)平 (H, h)|1989 年 1 月 8 日呈現January 8, 1989 to present| |33|昭和 (Showa)昭和 (Showa)|昭 （S，s）昭 (S, s)|1926 年 12 月 25 日 1989 年 1 月 7日，December 25, 1926 to January 7, 1989| |22|大正 (Taisho)大正 (Taisho)|大 （T、 t）大 (T, t)|1912 年 7 月 30 日 1926 年 12 月 24日，July 30, 1912 to December 24, 1926| |11|明治 （明治）明治 (Meiji)|明 （M，m）明 (M, m)|1868 年 9 月 8 日 1912 年 7 月 29日，September 8, 1868 to July 29, 1912| 一般情況下，類別支援從 9 月 8 日的日期中年份明治 1 (年 9 月 8，1868 西曆的)，也就是值的屬性。Ordinarily, the class supports dates from September 8 in the year Meiji 1 (September 8, 1868 of the Gregorian calendar), which is the value of the property. 不過，方法已成功傳回紀元的日期年 1 月 1 日到年 9 月 7 明治 1 年中 (年 1 月 1，1868 透過 1868 年 9 月 7，西曆)。However, the method successfully returns the era for dates from January 1 through September 7 in the year Meiji 1 (January 1, 1868 through September 7, 1868 in the Gregorian calendar). 早於 1868 年 1 月 1，西曆日期，方法會擲回例外狀況。For dates earlier than January 1, 1868 in the Gregorian calendar, the method throws an exception. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的數個元件的值方面日本曆法。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Japanese calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CPP/japanesecalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/CS/japanesecalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_AddGet/VB/japanesecalendar_addget.vb#1)]

exception.span: 產生的 在支援的範圍之外。

span.span: The resulting is outside the supported range.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetLeapMonth (int year, int era);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetLeapMonth(int32 year, int32 era) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetLeapMonth (year As Integer, era As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetLeapMonth(int year, int era);

span.span: A year.
An era.

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 傳回值永遠都會是 0，因為 型別不支援閏月的概念。

span.span: The return value is always 0 because the type does not support the notion of a leap month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

exception.span: 或 在 型別支援的範圍之外。

span.span: or is outside the range supported by the type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetWeekOfYear (DateTime time, System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule rule, DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek);

Public Overrides Function GetWeekOfYear (time As DateTime, rule As CalendarWeekRule, firstDayOfWeek As DayOfWeek) As Integer
public: override int GetWeekOfYear(DateTime time, System::Globalization::CalendarWeekRule rule, DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek);

span.span: The to read.

param.name: rule
param.span: 其中一個 值，可定義行事曆週。

span.span: One of the values that defines a calendar week.

param.name: firstDayOfWeek
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示一週的第一天。

span.span: One of the values that represents the first day of the week.

summary.span: 傳回年份中的週，包含指定 中的日期。

span.span: Returns the week of the year that includes the date in the specified .

returns.span: 從 1 起始的整數，表示 參數中日期所屬年份中的某週。

span.span: A 1-based integer that represents the week of the year that includes the date in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來判斷一年的週數藉由設定`time`一年的最後一天的參數。This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year. 屬性包含的特定文化特性的值，可用於`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`參數。The property contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters. 屬性包含預設值，表示使用行事曆中指定特定文化特性之當週的第一天屬性。The property of contains the default value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 屬性包含預設值，定義特定文化特性，使用中指定的行事曆日曆週屬性。The property of contains the default value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the property of . 例如，在、年 1 月 1 方法會傳回 1。For example, in , the method for January 1 returns 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將而有所不同，取決於和用的值。The following code example shows how the result of varies depending on the and values used. 如果指定的日期的年份，最後一天傳回該年份的週數總計。If the specified date is the last day of the year, returns the total number of weeks in that year. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CPP/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/CS/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear/VB/yslin_calendar_getweekofyear.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsLeapDay (int year, int month, int day, int era);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsLeapDay(int32 year, int32 month, int32 day, int32 era) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsLeapDay (year As Integer, month As Integer, day As Integer, era As Integer) As Boolean
public: override bool IsLeapDay(int year, int month, int day, int era);

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: month
param.span: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.

param.name: day
param.span: 從 1 到 31 的整數，表示日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日子是閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 閏年日本曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 例如，Nigatsu （二月） 第 29 天是唯一的閏日。For example, the 29th day of Nigatsu (February) is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫的第二個月 （二月） 五年的每個紀元的最後一天。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/japanesecalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/japanesecalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/japanesecalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 閏年日本曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏月是只發生在閏年整個月。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 日本曆法並沒有任何閏月。The Japanese calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫目前紀元中的五年中的所有月份。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CPP/japanesecalendar_isleapmonth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapMonth/CS/japanesecalendar_isleapmonth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapMonth/VB/japanesecalendar_isleapmonth.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 閏年日本曆法中對應至相同潤年西曆。Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar. 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫五年的每個紀元。The following example calls for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapYear#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapYear/CPP/japanesecalendar_isleapyear.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapYear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapYear/CS/japanesecalendar_isleapyear.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapYear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.IsLeapYear/VB/japanesecalendar_isleapyear.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得受目前 物件所支援的最晚日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the latest date and time supported by the current object.

value.span: 最晚的日期和時間所支援類型，這就相當於最後一刻的年 12 月 31 日到 9999 年

span.span: The latest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax/CPP/japanesecalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax/CS/japanesecalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax/VB/japanesecalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得受目前 物件所支援的最早日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the current object.

value.span: 最早日期和時間所支援類型，這就相當於 1868 年 9 月 8，西元第一個快照

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the first moment of September 8, 1868 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的最早日期類別是年 9 月 8，1868 西元，明治紀元的第一年。The earliest date supported by the class is September 8, 1868 C.E., in the first year of the Meiji era. 一般情況下，日期和時間使用的作業類別擲回例外狀況以取得此日期之前的日期。Ordinarily, date and time operations that use the class throw an exception for dates before this date. 不過，一些成員，例如方法，支援從 1868 年 1 月 1，透過年 9 月 7 日的日期中明治 1 年。However, some members, such as the method, support dates from January 1, 1868 through September 7 in the year Meiji 1. ## Examples 下列範例會取得曆法所支援的最早和最新日期。The following example gets the earliest and latest dates supported by the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax/CPP/japanesecalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax/CS/japanesecalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar_MinMax/VB/japanesecalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 傳回在指定紀元中設定為指定日期和時間的 。

span.span: Returns a that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.

returns.span: ，設定為目前紀元中指定的日期和時間。

span.span: The that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，因為它可以將任何以現行曆法的日期轉換成的西曆日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 西曆日期之後可用，例如，比較在不同的行事曆中的日期，或建立特定的日曆中的相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 表示要轉換年份的整數 (通常是兩位數)。

span.span: An integer (usually two digits) that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作 。This method implements . 年中日本曆法通常是少於四個位數，因為這個實作一律會傳回的值`year`參數。Because the year in the Japanese calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation always returns the value of the `year` parameter. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 不過，有效年份通常是以兩位數 (小於 100) 表示。However, a valid year is generally represented as two digits (less than 100). 傳遞的兩位數年份值，會導致將值轉換為四位數的值根據方法值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供四個位數的值，或如果提供零或負值，擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value, or if it supplies zero or a negative value, throws an exception.

exception.span: 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會實作 。This property implements . 年中日本曆法通常少於四個位數，此實作預設會傳回 99，因為不會影響傳回值。Because the year in the Japanese calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation returns 99 by default and does not affect the return value of .

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值小於 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值大於 8011 (或 )。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than 8011 (or ).

exception.span: 在設定作業中，目前執行個體是唯讀的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
